title: I Tricked Real Estate Agents To Let Me Poo In £10M Apartments
description: In this video, Max Fosh tricks real estate agents into letting him use the bathroom in luxury apartments worth £10 million.
summary: Max Fosh uses his charm and wit to convince real estate agents to allow him to use the bathroom in high-end apartments, leading to hilarious and awkward encounters.
payoff: The humor comes from the absurdity of the situation and the reactions of the real estate agents when they realize they have been duped into letting someone use the bathroom in expensive properties for no real reason.
